thread.title: Need For Speed EA Access Trial Arrives on October 29 For EA Access Subscribers
thread.title_full: Need For Speed EA Access Trial Arrives on October 29 For EA Access Subscribers

author: Steve_OS
title: Need For Speed EA Access Trial Arrives on October 29 For EA Access Subscribers
text: Need For Speed EA Access Trial Arrives on October 29 For EA Access Subscribers 08:00 AM - October 9, 2015 by Steve_OS The Need For Speed EA Access trial is scheduled to arrive on October 29 for EA Access subscribers. All of the recently released trial games have given subscribers 10 hours of gameplay, so that seems to be the standard. Also of note, EA Access trial games have recently arrived a day early at 5:00 PM ET. So it is very likely that subscribers will see the trial on October 28. Whichever the case, we will announce it, when it becomes available. Need For Speed is scheduled to release on November 3 for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. The PC version has been delayed until Spring of 2016 .
